reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

description.narrative: L'iniziativa si prefigge di migliorare le condizioni di vita dei detenuti nella progione di Roumieh attraverso il miglioramento delle condizioni delle strutture, il recupero e sostegno ai detenuti ai fini del reinserimento sociale attraverso attività terapeutiche, socio-ricreative, educative e lavorative

The programme will supoprt the activities ongoing in Roumieh prison through: adequate food distribution,enancing the promenade area and the multifunctional rooms, providing rehabilitation and vocational training programmes and income generating activities

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

Strengthen relevant national institutions, including through international cooperation, for building capacity at all levels, in particular in developing countries, to prevent violence and combat terrorism and crime
